text: Pustelnik may refer to the following places in Poland: *Pustelnik, Lower Silesian Voivodeship (south-west Poland) *Pustelnik, Lublin Voivodeship (east Poland) *Pustelnik, Łódź Voivodeship (central Poland) *Pustelnik, Marki — part of the Marki city *Pustelnik, Mińsk County in Masovian Voivodeship (east- central Poland) *Pustelnik, Sokołów County in Masovian Voivodeship (east- central Poland)
title: Pustelnik
